minicp.examples

Class Eternity

  • java.lang.Object
    • minicp.examples.SatisfactionProblem
      • minicp.examples.Eternity

  • public class Eternity
extends SatisfactionProblem
    The Eternity II puzzle is an edge-matching puzzle which involves placing 256 square puzzle pieces into a 16 by 16 grid, constrained by the requirement to match adjacent edges. Wikipedia.
